document.full_text: new york city leads the nation in at least two areas: private-sector job growth and the commercial property market's revival, state comptroller thomas dinapoli said in a report released on friday.
document.title: nyc tops u.s. in private jobs, commercial property: state
lines_and_colors: new york city leads the nation in at least two areas: private-sector job growth and the commercial property market's revival, state comptroller thomas dinapoli said in a report released on friday.
